typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Customer Staging Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Customer Surrogate Key} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Integration
source(output(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer,
		{Customer Surrogate Key} as string,
		iscurrent as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
Integration, DimCustomer lookup(Integration@{WWI Customer ID} == DimCustomer@{WWI Customer ID},
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIDs
SelectColumns split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)
ConditionSplit1@NewRow derive(iscurrent = 1,
		{Valid From} = currentTimestamp(),
		{Lineage Key} = 2) ~> SetAttrsForNew
Filter2 derive(iscurrent = 1,
		{Valid From} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrUpdate
ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates, DimCustomer exists(ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@{WWI Customer ID} == DimCustomer@{WWI Customer ID} &&

(
    ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@Customer != DimCustomer@Customer ||
    ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@{Bill To Customer} != DimCustomer@{Bill To Customer} ||
    ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@Category != DimCustomer@Category ||
    ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@{Buying Group} != DimCustomer@{Buying Group} ||
    ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@{Primary Contact} != DimCustomer@{Primary Contact} ||
    ConditionSplit1@CheckForUpdates@{Postal Code} != DimCustomer@{Postal Code} ||
    {Int Valid From} != {Valid From}
),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'left')~> checkForChanges
Filter1 derive(iscurrent = 0,
		{New Valid To} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrInactive
SetAttrInactive alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
LookupIDs select(mapColumn(
		{WWI Customer ID} = Integration@{WWI Customer ID},
		Customer = Integration@Customer,
		{Bill To Customer} = Integration@{Bill To Customer},
		Category = Integration@Category,
		{Buying Group} = Integration@{Buying Group},
		{Primary Contact} = Integration@{Primary Contact},
		{Postal Code} = Integration@{Postal Code},
		{Int Valid From} = Integration@{Valid From},
		{Int Valid To} = Integration@{Valid To},
		{Customer Surrogate Key} = Integration@{Customer Surrogate Key},
		{Dim Valid From} = DimCustomer@{Valid From},
		{Dim Valid To} = DimCustomer@{Valid To},
		{Lineage Key},
		iscurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
checkForChanges filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
checkForChanges filter({Dim Valid To} == {Int Valid To}) ~> Filter2
SetAttrUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer,
		{Customer Surrogate Key} as string,
		iscurrent as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		{WWI Customer ID},
		Customer,
		{Bill To Customer},
		Category,
		{Buying Group},
		{Primary Contact},
		{Postal Code},
		{Valid From},
		{Valid To} = {Int Valid To},
		{Lineage Key},
		{Customer Surrogate Key},
		iscurrent
	)) ~> SinkUpdate
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer,
		{Customer Surrogate Key} as string,
		iscurrent as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['WWI Customer ID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		{WWI Customer ID},
		Customer,
		{Bill To Customer},
		Category,
		{Buying Group},
		{Primary Contact},
		{Postal Code},
		{Valid From} = {Dim Valid From},
		{Valid To} = {New Valid To},
		{Lineage Key},
		{Customer Surrogate Key},
		iscurrent
	)) ~> sinkInactive
SetAttrsForNew sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer,
		{Customer Surrogate Key} as string,
		iscurrent as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		{WWI Customer ID},
		Customer,
		{Bill To Customer},
		Category,
		{Buying Group},
		{Primary Contact},
		{Postal Code},
		{Valid From},
		{Valid To} = {Int Valid To},
		{Lineage Key},
		{Customer Surrogate Key},
		iscurrent
	)) ~> sinkNew
